timeline.bodyText: Either this or the help should be updated, they both show different values...
timeline.author: ricekot
thc202

timeline.bodyText: This needs to take into account the browser set, otherwise it might return a previous browser (e.g. if the user later changed to Chrome).
timeline.author: thc202
thc202

timeline.bodyText: Should call the equivalent for Chrome. It should also check that Chrome (and Firefox?) is really available (and return or not in testBrowsers).
